column2: NYC...I am really hard on "Other People's Pizza
column3: I am not down with O.P.P" but since I was in Chi-town
column4: I decided to peep out their beloved Pizza. And I must say
column5: it was really tasty-like a nice twist on the concept of pizza. The service-accommodating and friendly. The decor-nice brick structure with historic art on the walls. The Pizza-really flavorful
